dct_description_sm: This polygon data layer represents lakes for Colorado in 2003. The dataset was originally published by the Colorado Department of Transportation on December 31, 2003.[Features in this dataset represent areal bodies of water, such as lakes, reservoirs, and wide rivers. Features are represented by polygon geographic shapes. To form a full set of hydrography for the state of Colorado, please combine this polygonal data with the linear geographic dataset named STREAMS.]
